channel.title: Korsakovia
channel.description:
Recently I had the pleasure of playing Korsakovia, a new mod from thechineseroom. You should definitely check it out here > [url]https://www.moddb.com/mods/korsakovia[/url]
It's great to see such an original idea in a mod and I'd love to hear your feedback on how you find it.

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: lizardhound
item.description:
Definitely, although the game is incredibly creative and an interesting expierment in game design, it lacks in the areas of new textures and decent level design.

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Agreed. There are 1 or 2 moments where I pretty much froze up, I had goosebumps, and then all I could think was “RUN RUN RUN” in an attempt to get away from the madness.
I.E. It’s actually scary.

Edit: Just beat it. Only complaint is the last level. The atmosphere, music, and voicing was just as well done as all the previous levels, but I found it to become a bit tedious overtime and almost too hectic.

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: lizardhound
item.description:
The whole game is running, really keeps you paranoid and jumpy.

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Ah, the apartment block. All I can say is keep running. Run down the hall, run around the fog, and just keep running!

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
I’m stuck in some sort of apartment block, and there’s the fog coming up the stairs. I keep dying there.

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
YES, EXACTLY.

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: Patonki
item.description:
Keresh:

It’s part of the story bro. Thanks to that loud static you feel like that mentally ill guy.

CHRISTOPHER, WAKE UP @_____@

Yeah forcing me to use speakers was a part of the story too.

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: alltogethernow
item.description:
Boner.

BRB DOWNLOADING

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
This game is twisted. The level design is so fucked up, and the static is…unsettling for some reason.

Read full topic

item.description:
Always crashed for me.

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: lizardhound
item.description:
Great mod, Pincheck is really expiermental and creative in his game design . Although i would like it if the player direction would be a it better.
for those stuck in the warehouse, there is a ladder attached to one of the steel supporting collumns, it is hard to find as it is hiding from your imediate view.

Read full topic

item.description:
It looks like shit. I’d maybe play it to the end if it didn’t have horrible player direction and LOUD AS FUCK STATIC WHAT THE HELL

item.description:
The big green room filled with black foggies? I’m stuck there too.

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
I made it to the warehouse after the hospital and haven’t gotten back into it yet. I can’t figure out where I’m suppose to go, just that the catwalk on the ceiling is probably important and I’ll need a crowbar to get through the locked door.

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: Lopez
item.description:
I read something to do with attacking black fog with a crowbar and assumed you meant to type dog. When I realised that you were in fact talking about attacking black fog my interest peaked. I shall download the mod when my graphics card returns from being repaired

Read full topic

item.description:
Yep, couple of hits should dissipate it

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
I have the crowbar. So it can be killed?

Read full topic

item.title: Korsakovia
item.dc:creator: Unknowncode
item.description:
Brother Shrike:

I got to the part where you first get attacked by the black fog. Are you supposed to kill it or what?

If you have the crowbar, feel free to whack it as hard as you can. If you don’t however, your best bet is to do one of the following:

  1. Run like a lunatic
  2. Lock yourself in a room and wait till it goes away
  3. Lock it in a room
  4. Find a crowbar

Hope that helps

Read full topic
